Sinesis shrugs.

"Let's just go out scouting." Sinesis says. He posed and p=
ut Sinister's sword away. Then he walked out the door and noticed the battl=
e about to take place between Plintissa and Dracona...
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Frid=
ay, August 04, 2000 9:56 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Twister


  Twister: Oka=
y, let's ask her. Over Commlink or face to face?

  *Twister asks Sinesis*
=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:37 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


   =
 "Maybe, how about we ask Dracona?" Sinesis says to Twister...
      ----- =
Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egrou=
ps.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW
=


      Twister

      *Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

      T=
wister: Do you know of anyone that would like to die?

      *Twister asks =
Sinesis*

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
    =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:52 PM
 =
       Subject: Re: NBW


        Sinesis eagerly shakes Twister's hand.

 =
       "Partners!" Sinesis says...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
=
          From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        =
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


      =
    Twister


          *Twister looks at Sinesis*

          Twister: It s=
eems that we have something in common and I need a partner too.

          =
*Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

          Twister: Partner?

       =
   *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extended*

            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
            Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
            Subject:=
 Re: NBW


            "Traveling alone, though? What about all the bots we=
 killed together? What about all of the times we took shots for each other?=
 It's horribly not fair. I wish I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He lo=
oked closer at Twister.

            "Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis=
 askes Twister...
              ----- Original Message ----- 
             =
 From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
 Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
              Subject: Re: NBW


   =
           Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



              *Twister looks at the=
 sword and sighs*

              Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact=
 that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....
=

              *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eag=
les into her arm compartment*


              *Blizzard looks at Sinister a=
nd smiles*

              Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the b=
ase.



              *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

              In=
fectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the others but....

      =
        *Infectra sighs*

              Infectra: I need to stop thinking o=
f things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because t=
here were hardly none.

              *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins=
*


                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: THE=
CODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday,=
 August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
                Subject: Re: NBW


               =
 Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

                "He left =
this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just w=
ish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

                =
Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

=
                Stranato calls out.

                "Hey, any Maximals her=
e?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. H=
e smiles.

                "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they=
 must know of the occurences happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been =
good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber=
 said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
                  ----- Origi=
nal Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
               =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, August 03, 200=
0 11:44 PM
                  Subject: Re: NBW


                  Twister/B=
lizzard/Infectra



                  *Twister looks at Sinesis*

         =
         Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...For she's my sister an=
d I love her too much to pull her away from the she loves....

            =
      *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a two small pieces o=
f energon both shaped like an eagle*

                  Twister: Our parent=
s gave us both one to unite us as sisters and friends forever and always he=
lp each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of the base. I dou=
bt she dropped it by accident.....

                  *Twister holds out to=
 Sinesis so he can see*



                  (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ul=
tima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

                  *Blizzard skips out of the ca=
ve and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand o=
ut wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



                  *Infectra follow=
s Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


                    -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
               =
     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Thursday, August 03,=
 2000 6:59 PM
                    Subject: Re: NBW


                    Si=
nesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                =
    Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

 =
                   "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

=
                    Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since =
they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on =
in...
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                 =
     From: ilovealllizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                     Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
              =
        Subject: Re: NBW


                      Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Tw=
ister


                      *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towa=
rds the Maximal Base*



                      *Wrath gets into a CR Chambe=
r when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



               =
       *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister =
for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold han=
ds with him*



                      (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal=
 Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

                      *Twister=
 leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else wh=
ere and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesi=
s*

                      Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I e=
nd up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my si=
ster could be sisters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such ha=
ppiness could happen.....

                      *Twister puts her double s=
ided sword away stares at the table*


                        ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                        From: THECODE 
                  =
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Thursday, Augus=
t 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                        Subject: NBW


                 =
       Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the Maximal base.

            =
            Gangon, still dying.

                        Deemos and Inzola=
 confront one another several times, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

 =
                       Etchingar called out to Megatron.

                 =
       "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

                        Time Bom=
b waited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, l=
ooking to meet Megatron.

                        Sinister came out of the =
cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.=


                        Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister..=
.
